screen_desc: The screenshot shows the settings menu of a smartphone. The top right corner has a settings icon. Below the settings icon, there's a search bar for searching settings. The settings menu includes options such as Network & internet, Connected devices, Apps, Notifications, Battery, Storage, and Sound & vibration. The battery is currently at 100%, and the storage shows 57.72 GB free space. There are buttons at the bottom for Screenshot and Select.
action_think: To open the app 'AliExpress', I need to first exit the settings menu and navigate to the home screen or app drawer where the app is likely installed.
action_plan: Navigate to the home screen or app drawer
action_result: By pressing the home button, you have moved to the home screen. To open the AliExpress app, you will need to find it in the app drawer or on your home screen. This is necessary because to open the app, you need to access it from the app drawer or home screen.
